item.title: The 7 Hours of Creation
item.description: Yes this title is a play on words, and yes you are going to see a lot more of them. It didn’t actually take 7 hours, but this is the process and steps I used for creating my website.

item.title: Jerry's Mom Has Got It Goin On'
item.description: Oh my how the clever titles continue. This is a box walkthrough of Jerry from HTB. Come and follow along as we discover the vulnerabilties, exploit the machine, and hack the box!

item.title: Lame is Cool
item.description: Clever titles for days. This walkthough of the Lame box is another begginner friendly entry level HTB. We'll explore a little anonymous FTP, and find out more about Samba. s
